MainHeading.P: Do chuaidh an Ceann Comhairle i gceannas ar 3 p.m.

MainHeading.Title: Death of the Pope—Letter from Cardinal-Chamberlain.

Speaker.P: I have received the following communication from His Eminence Cardinal Pacelli:—

MainHeading.P: “To His Excellency, Mr. Frank Fahy, Chairman of Dáil Eireann, Dublin. The adjournment of Dáil Eireann as a mark of respect to our beloved departed Pontiff has moved us deeply and consoled us. Please accept and convey to the members of Dáil Eireann this expression of our profound gratitude.

Speaker.P: As the body of His Holiness Pope Pius XI is being laid to rest to-day it is fitting, as an expression of national mourning, that An Dáil should adjourn and I, therefore, move, A Chinn Comhairle, that the House do adjourn until 3 o'clock to-morrow.
The Dáil adjourned at 3.5 p.m. until 3 o'clock on Wednesday, 15th February, 1939.
